tha-ap286:0.3_0: He then enjoyed himself with the most senior monk in charge.
tha-ap286:1.1_0: In my right, hard to be happy,
tha-ap286:1.4_0: yellow, with yellow hue, and yellow tint.
tha-ap286:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap286:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap286:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bakkula.
tha-ap286:6.1_0: The fourth part of the senior monks with flowers.
